cards: What's something you wish everyone should know? How would the world be different if everyone knew this?
What would the world be like if no one could lie?
What would the world be like if we could reach each others minds?
What would the world be like if animals could talk?
What would the world be like if your skin color changes with yours emotions
What would the world be like if there were no clothes
What would the world be like if girls boobs would inflate when they are horny
What would the world be like if peoples memory was reset every week, except basic knowledge (eg: how to read, write, walking, etc)
